actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1124(c) of title 10, United States Code, to remove the restriction that a member of the armed forces must be on active duty to be eligible for the payment of a cash award for a suggestion, invention, or scientific achievement.

summary.text: Removes the restriction that a member of the armed forces must be on active duty to be eligible for the payment of a cash award for suggestion, invention, or scientific achievement. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1124(c)).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1124(c) of title 10, United States Code, to remove the restriction that a member of the armed forces must be on active duty to be eligible for the payment of a cash award for a suggestion, invention, or scientific achievement.
